Apply.title: HUST AI II Introduction
Apply.content: Huake Artificial Intelligence Innovation Center is an artificial intelligence based on Huazhong University of Science and Technology and its international friend schools.Artificial intelligence jointly established by high-level scholars in basic research and application scenario research in the research field Advanced Institute.

Domain.title: HUST AI II
Domain.subtitle: Current research directions and fields
Domain.description: Combining the advantages of R&D, industry, talents, innovation resources, etc., we will expand artificial intelligence technology in the following industries

News.title: NEWS
News.content1: High adaptive sensing equipment and disaster source location technology for urban fire, explosion and integrated pipe gallery accidents
News.content2: Study on imaging method of multi-component gas concentration field based on acoustic velocity dispersion
News.content3: Research on intelligent fault diagnosis and leak monitoring of natural gas station based on audio signal
News.content4: Research on defect detection technology and diagnosis method of high voltage Shunt Reactor based on acoustic vibration signal
News.content5: Research on GIS equipment handover acceptance and mechanical status detection and diagnosis technology during operation
